model

Interface StockModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockStockModel, StockModelImpl

    public interface StockModel
    The interface defines a StockModel where user can do some manipulation of stocks he owns.

    • Method Summary

              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the name is illegal.

      • buy

        double buy(java.lang.String portfolioName,
           java.lang.String companyName,
           int shares,
           java.lang.String date)
    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The method buy some stock in the market and add them to a designated Portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - The target Portfolio that user whats to put stocks in.
        companyName - The company's name of the desire stocks.
        shares - The desired number of shares.
        date - The date of the stock.
        Returns:
        The total cost of this buy-in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is illegal.

      • determineCost

        double determineCost(java.lang.String portfolioName)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The method determines the total costs of all stocks in a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - The desired Portfolio name.
        Returns:
        The total cost (low price) of stocks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is illegal.

      • determineValue

        double determineValue(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                      java.lang.String date)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The method determines the value of all stocks in a portfolio at a certain date..
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - The desired Portfolio name.
        date - The date of interests.
        Returns:
        The total value (high price) of stocks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is illegal.
